price: who will inherit [prophethood] from me and from the house of Jacob, and make him, O Lord, well pleasing to You.”
arabic: يَرِثُنِي وَيَرِثُ مِنۡ ءَالِ يَعۡقُوبَۖ وَٱجۡعَلۡهُ رَبِّ رَضِيّٗا
